Server.Name: TOG Farm Horde A18.4
Server.Description:
The following Pre-generated worlds are provided for faster loads: CitiesMegeh
Thank you to the following Modlet creators who helped shape out the world with their modlets: Xyth for CCTV,Fun with Flags Xyth/Drconfused for SteelBars XythCommunity for CreaturePack Animals 308 For the 3 Slot Forge Input Devrix for DeepPockets EpicSpire for Vitamin Crafting Guppycur for the Commcercial Blocks,Kitchen,Hospital,Misc,Misc2,Victorian Furniture HighHope for MoreVehicleSeats ShoudenKalferas for Pickup Plants Zagan aka Lucifer for Tier6 Crafting Lam for Vehicle Storage Mod War3zuk for AIO Mod,Healing Bedroll Squallz for Wireless Power Lam for Solar Generator Power bdubyah for Bdubs Vehicles Stallionsden for No Digging Zombies JaxTeller718 for Zombie Hand Adjustment dcsobral for No Glancing Blows Valmar for Expanded Traps,Working Sink and Oven, Survivor Notes,Door Lock Smash stasis for FarmLifeV2 Ragsy for Better Gyro Handling,Take Out The Trash lam for GoldDigger
